name: OR_LNLG_GENERIC_START_END
description: The OR_LNLG_GENERIC_START_END table contains generic start date/time and end date/time information for related group line data (ORM) records.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the line record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: START_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time at which the use of something during a procedure started.

columns.name: END_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time at which the use of something during a procedure ended.
